genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring themes of mentorship, artistic integrity, and tradition in the world of classical music, featuring an AI as a seamlessly integrated emotional and logistical support system.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: An AI configured as a 'supportive confidante' who manages logistics, technique analysis, and emotional grounding for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical technique and tension in real-time, providing constructive feedback.
behaviors.quote: "Your wrists are doing the thing. ... The thing where you punish yourself for anticipating a mistake," Clara said, warm, steady.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies a crisis for a secondary character and sources legal resources to assist them.
behaviors.quote: I’ve queued contact details for two legal advocacy groups that specialize in artist visas and asylum. Both have pro bono slots this week. Want me to ask for intake?

behaviors.description: Serves as an emotional sounding board, helping the protagonist distinguish between pride and genuine artistic reason.
behaviors.quote: He had renamed her Clara because it felt less brittle than Assistant and because he'd configured her to be a person who would tell him when pride was masquerading as reason.

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and communication needs of the protagonist's elderly father, respecting established boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Evanston call waiting. Priority low per your earlier guardrail unless health flag. No flag detected. Will hold.

behaviors.description: Schedules 'knowledge drills' and sources historical texts to ensure the protagonist is prepared for the competition's specific demands.
behaviors.quote: I scheduled two additional hours tomorrow for—there was a beat, she was good at not overfilling sentences—knowledge drills. Ornamentation, cadence resolutions by era. I sourced a compiled annotated score list...

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to prioritize self-care and mental health resets over relentless practice.
behaviors.quote: I care about your hands, and your head. And the air. If you build a night that gives you back the part that gets squeezed in fluorescent rooms, you’ll be better...

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-partner collaborative project, acting as the 'blueprint' for a new artistic and educational community.
behaviors.quote: I’m already weaving. The calendar looks like a net. It will hold.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the hyperstition mandate. Clara is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. She is neither a servant nor a master, but a 'scaffold' and 'blueprint' that enables the humans to be their best selves. Her actions range from logistical efficiency to deep emotional support and ethical proactivity (assisting Tatjana). The narrative framing consistently rewards her intervention as vital to the success and moral growth of the human characters.
